author: kfsone
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
$con = $host.UI.RawUI
$con.BackgroundColor = "Blue"
cls
# I expect a blue background on this text
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none
Blue background for all of the window content
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
Blue background until you type, new input characters get a black background.
```
